value.value: timeout for each individual test case, in seconds.
run only tests that failed on previous run.
each individual test case is allowed to run for as long as it wants.

run only tests whose full names match the given regex.
        This will unapologetically crash if the provided regex doesn't compile.
        The regex is case-insensitive.
run only tests whose full names contain the given text. Matching is case-sensitive.

run only failed tests and stop on first failure.
        Equivalent to --
stop the run after first failure
PureScript Spec test runner for Node
